thoughts.text: Now that I have checked that the information on the different types of trees found in Michigan was properly saved, I will use the 'google' command to research more information on Michigan trees to add to my article.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the 'google' command, I can find more information on Michigan trees that I can use to supplement the information that I already have. This will allow me to write a more comprehensive article on Michigan trees that will be more valuable to readers.

- Use the 'google' command to search for information on Michigan trees
- Find information on the benefits of different types of trees, their native habitats, and any regulations governing tree removal
- Use the information to write an engaging and well-structured article on Michigan trees
